vote.text: Amendment SA 6582 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 6582 proposed by Senator Heinrich for Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S9610; text: CR S9610) To support multi-jurisdictional task forces.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 6582 proposed by Senator Heinrich for Senator Durbin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 6582 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
